                    rv = "".join((rv[:-len(suffix)], "ir"))

                    step1_success = True

                        word = word[:-2]
                        rv = rv[:-2]

                        rv = "".join((rv[:-len(suffix)], "u"))

                        rv = "".join((rv[:-len(suffix)], "ente"))

                        rv = rv[:-len(suffix)]

                            rv = rv[:-2]

                    break

                rv = rv[:-1]
